text: Brodersen is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Arvid Brodersen (1904–1996), Norwegian sociologist *Friedrich Brodersen (1873–1926), German opera singer *Kai Brodersen (born 1958), German historian and classical scholar *Robert W. Brodersen (born 1945), American electrical engineer *Viggo Brodersen (1879–1965), Danish classical composer and pianist ==See also== *17965 Brodersen, a main-belt asteroid
title: Brodersen
